title: Lol Why so Noob & Troll Players

embed.description: Why are there people who like to troll others? Not only does it damage itself but the whole team, both on one side and the other. since the game does not deserve to be played

replies.body: I never troll unless i'm playing trundle, and in that case it's just me declaring that in champion select "I'm going to troll" (i don't actually troll of course, just me saying that i'm going to because well, Trundle) so far 1 person has fallen for it.
He wasted Yasuo's Flash, Pantheon's ult, 2 Lux ults, and an Ezreal ult.
He lost nothing .Yasuo was playing with him

Riot does little to nothing to these kinds of people. Yet make one snarly semi abusing comment to this guy who's destroying the game and get a strike against you and a potential perma ban.

This is why League sucks so badly and why it's so frustrating. The games reporting system is fundamentally flawed and until it's changed heavily the game will forever be nothing but trash for general players.
